collections.name: att_classes

properties.name: att_class_id
properties.description: The unique identifier for an attribute class.

properties.name: att_class
properties.description: The name or description of the attribute class.

collections.description: Stores information about attribute classes, such as 'indoors' or 'cluttered'.

collections.name: img_obj

properties.name: img_id
properties.description: Identifier representing a specific image.

properties.name: obj_sample_id
properties.description: Identifier for a specific object sample within an image.

properties.name: obj_class_id
properties.description: The identifier indicating the class of the object.

properties.name: x
properties.description: The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the object's bounding box.

properties.name: y
properties.description: The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the object's bounding box.

properties.name: w
properties.description: The width of the object's bounding box.

properties.name: h
properties.description: The height of the object's bounding box.

collections.description: Maps objects to images, including their bounding box coordinates.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The bounding box of an object is defined by the coordinates (X, Y) and dimensions (W, H).

collections.name: img_obj_att

properties.name: img_id
properties.description: Identifier of the image containing the object with the attribute.

properties.name: att_class_id
properties.description: Identifier of the attribute class associated with the object.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: If one IMG_ID has many ATT_CLASS_ID, it refers to that this image has multiple attributes.

properties.name: obj_sample_id
properties.description: Identifier of the object sample that has the attribute.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: If one IMG_ID has many OBJ_SAMPLE_ID, it refers to that this image has multiple objects. If one ATT_CLASS_ID has many OBJ_SAMPLE_ID, it refers to that this attribute is composed of multiple objects.

collections.description: A junction table that links objects within images to their specific attributes.

collections.name: img_rel

properties.name: img_id
properties.description: Identifier of the image where the relationship occurs.

properties.name: pred_class_id
properties.description: Identifier of the predicate class that describes the relationship between the two objects.

properties.name: obj1_sample_id
properties.description: Identifier of the first object (subject) in the relationship.

properties.name: obj2_sample_id
properties.description: Identifier of the second object (object) in the relationship.

collections.description: Describes relationships between pairs of objects within an image.

commonsense evidence.self-relation: If OBJ1_SAMPLE_ID equals OBJ2_SAMPLE_ID, the relationship is a self-relation.
commonsense evidence.multiple-relations: If a pair of (OBJ1_SAMPLE_ID, OBJ2_SAMPLE_ID) has multiple PRED_CLASS_ID, it means the two objects have multiple relations.

collections.name: obj_classes

properties.name: obj_class_id
properties.description: A unique identifier for each object class.

properties.name: obj_class
properties.description: The name of the object class.

collections.description: Contains the definitions of object classes, like 'awning' or 'kitchen'.

collections.name: pred_classes

properties.name: pred_class_id
properties.description: The unique identifier for a prediction (predicate) class.

properties.name: pred_class
properties.description: The caption or description for the predicate class, representing a relationship.

collections.description: Defines predicate classes, which describe relationships between objects (e.g., 'playing on', 'covers').

relationships.name: img_objs
relationships.description: Retrieves all image objects belonging to this object class.

relationships.name: obj_class
relationships.description: Retrieves the object class for this image object.

relationships.name: attributes
relationships.description: Retrieves all attributes associated with this image object.

relationships.name: img_obj
relationships.description: Retrieves the image object that has this attribute.

relationships.name: img_obj_attributes
relationships.description: Retrieves all image object attributes for this attribute class.

relationships.name: att_class
relationships.description: Retrieves the attribute class for this image object attribute.

relationships.name: relationships_as_object
relationships.description: Retrieves all relationships where this image object is the second object (object of the predicate).

relationships.name: object_2
relationships.description: Retrieves the second image object (object of the predicate) in the relationship.

relationships.name: relationships_as_subject
relationships.description: Retrieves all relationships where this image object is the first object (subject of the predicate).

relationships.name: object_1
relationships.description: Retrieves the first image object (subject of the predicate) in the relationship.

relationships.name: image_relationships
relationships.description: Retrieves all image relationships that are of this predicate class.

relationships.name: predicate_class
relationships.description: Retrieves the predicate class for this image relationship.
